metadata.name: Filter Driver Unloaded Via Fltmc.EXE
metadata.comment: Detect filter driver unloading activity via fltmc.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\fltmc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('fltmc.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('unload')) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\temp\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\endpoint-protection-installer-x64.tmp')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('unload rtp_filesystem_filter')) OR lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\manageengine\\\\uems_agent\\\\bin\\\\dcfaservice64.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('unload dfmfilter'))))

output.summary: Detect filter driver unloading activity via fltmc.exe
